page.title: 02LAKESIDE HOLIDAYS, WOOTTON
page.content: {Lakeside Holiday Camp}is situated off the main road through Wootton beside the Old Mill Pond. On site is a swimming pool that is also open to the public, tennis courts, childrens play area, bar and discos. Most people camp in their own tents but some stay in chalets. About fifty people are employed catering for up to nine hundred visitors. The site is only open in the summer. We spoke to a young couple staying at the camp site. They said they came to Lakeside because it had easy access to the car ferry and a friend said it was a nice area. During the day the family leave Wootton and go sight seeing or to the beach but use the facilities in the evenings. They had not come to the Island before but if they come again they will probably stay at Wootton.
